casebody.data:
No. —, original.

Ex Parte: In the Matter of Apex Electric Manufacturing Company. June 6, 1927.

The motion for leave to file petition for a writ of mandamus is denied without prejudice to an application for a writ of mandamus to the Circuit Court of Appeals for *726the Seventh Circuit.

Messrs. Elwood G. Godman, Ralph E. Moody, and Bernard Barnard for petitioner.
